product_details.regulated_description: Complete food for cats aged 7 and over.
product_details.product_description: FELIX® As Good As It Looks 7+ is a range of irresistible meals, that look, smell and taste so delicious they’re just like food you might have cooked yourself! Each recipe, made with quality ingredients, has tender pieces in jelly for a tasty meal your cat will love! They’re also specially designed for cats aged 7+ with the right combination of proteins and vitamins including antioxidants to help keep your cat full of energy and ready for mischief! They’re packed with healthy goodness and satisfy 100% of your cat’s daily needs when served according to the feeding guidelines. That’s not all! FELIX As Good As It Looks 7+ is available in a wide range of delicious recipes in succulent jelly to satisfy your cat’s love of variety every day. They really do taste as good as they look! FELIX - Just irresistible!

distributor.name: Nestlé Suisse S.A.
distributor.address: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

general_information.label: Consumer storage instructions
values: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

declarations.feeding_instructions: Feeding guide : For an average senior cat (4kg), feed 2 to 3 pouches per day in at least 2 separate meals. The senior maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight. Serve at room temperature. Clean, fresh drinking water should always be available. Feeding guide : For an average senior cat (4kg), feed 3 pouches per day in at least 2 separate meals. The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight. Serve at room temperature. Clean, fresh drinking water should always be available.

declarations.feed_analytical_constituents_statement: Analytical Constituents: Moisture: 80%, Protein: 12%, Fat Content: 3%, Crude Ash: 2,5%, Crude fibre: 0,6%.
declarations.feed_additives_statement: Additives: Nutritional additives: IU/kg: Vit A: 753; Vit D3: 105; Vit E: 114; mg/kg: Iron (II) sulfate monohydrate: (Fe: 9.2); Anhydrous calcium iodate: (I: 0.27); Copper(II) sulfate pentahydrate: (Cu: 0.69); Manganous sulfate monohydrate: (Mn: 1.3); Zinc sulfate monohydrate: (Zn: 13.1); Taurine: 343. Aromas.
